diseases.name: Tuberculosis (TB)
diseases.symptoms: Chronic cough, weight loss, night sweats, fever, fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Long-term antibiotic therapy, isolation in active cases, supportive care.

diseases.name: Pneumonia
diseases.causative_agent: Streptococcus pneumoniae, Haemophilus influenzae, Mycoplasma pneumoniae
diseases.symptoms: Cough with phlegm, fever, chills, difficulty breathing, chest pain.
diseases.treatment: Antibiotic therapy, oxygen support, rest.

diseases.name: Meningitis
diseases.causative_agent: Neisseria meningitidis, Streptococcus pneumoniae, Haemophilus influenzae
diseases.symptoms: Severe headache, stiff neck, fever, nausea, sensitivity to light.
diseases.treatment: Immediate antibiotic therapy, hospitalization, corticosteroids.

diseases.name: Cholera
diseases.symptoms: Severe watery diarrhea, dehydration, vomiting, rapid heart rate.
diseases.treatment: Oral rehydration therapy (ORT), antibiotics in severe cases.

diseases.name: Typhoid Fever
diseases.symptoms: High fever, abdominal pain, constipation or diarrhea, weakness.
diseases.treatment: Antibiotic therapy, fluid replacement, proper hygiene.

diseases.name: Diphtheria
diseases.symptoms: Thick gray coating in throat, sore throat, difficulty breathing, swollen lymph nodes.
diseases.treatment: Diphtheria antitoxin, antibiotic therapy, vaccination.

diseases.name: Whooping Cough (Pertussis)
diseases.symptoms: Severe coughing fits, whooping sound during breathing, vomiting after coughing.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, antibiotics in early stages, vaccination.

diseases.name: Leprosy (Hansen’s Disease)
diseases.symptoms: Skin lesions, nerve damage, loss of sensation, muscle weakness.
diseases.treatment: Long-term multidrug therapy, supportive care.

diseases.name: Plague
diseases.symptoms: Fever, chills, swollen lymph nodes, blackened skin (in septicemic plague).
diseases.treatment: Immediate antibiotic therapy, supportive care, isolation.

diseases.name: Syphilis
diseases.symptoms: Painless sores (chancres), rash, fever, swollen lymph nodes, neurological complications (late stage).
diseases.treatment: Antibiotic therapy, regular follow-up testing.
diseases.medicine: Penicillin G, Doxycycline (if allergic to penicillin).

diseases.name: Gonorrhea
diseases.symptoms: Painful urination, discharge, pelvic pain, possible infertility.
diseases.treatment: Antibiotic therapy, partner treatment, prevention methods.

diseases.name: Chlamydia
diseases.symptoms: Painful urination, genital discharge, pelvic pain, eye infections (in newborns).
diseases.treatment: Antibiotic therapy, safe sexual practices, partner treatment.

diseases.name: Botulism
diseases.symptoms: Paralysis, blurred vision, difficulty swallowing, respiratory failure.
diseases.treatment: Antitoxin administration, respiratory support, hospitalization.

diseases.name: Tetanus (Lockjaw)
diseases.symptoms: Muscle stiffness, jaw lock, difficulty swallowing, seizures.
diseases.treatment: Tetanus immune globulin, wound care, muscle relaxants.

diseases.name: Common Cold
diseases.symptoms: Sneezing, runny nose, sore throat, cough, mild fever.
diseases.treatment: Rest, hydration, symptomatic relief with over-the-counter medication.

diseases.name: Influenza (Flu)
diseases.symptoms: Fever, chills, muscle aches, cough, sore throat, fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Antiviral medications, rest, hydration, vaccination for prevention.

diseases.name: COVID-19
diseases.symptoms: Fever, cough, shortness of breath, fatigue, loss of taste or smell.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, oxygen therapy, antiviral drugs, vaccination.

diseases.name: Dengue Fever
diseases.symptoms: High fever, severe headache, joint and muscle pain, skin rash, bleeding tendencies.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, hydration, pain relief.

diseases.name: Hepatitis (A, B, C, D, E)
diseases.symptoms: Jaundice, fatigue, nausea, abdominal pain, dark urine.
diseases.treatment: Antiviral therapy for chronic cases, supportive care, vaccination for prevention.

diseases.name: Measles
diseases.symptoms: Fever, cough, runny nose, red eyes, rash.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, hydration, vitamin A supplementation.
diseases.medicine: Vitamin A, Acetaminophen for fever management.

diseases.name: Mumps
diseases.symptoms: Swollen salivary glands, fever, headache, muscle aches.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, rest, hydration.

diseases.name: Rubella (German Measles)
diseases.symptoms: Mild fever, rash, swollen lymph nodes, joint pain.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, vaccination for prevention.

diseases.name: Chickenpox (Varicella)
diseases.symptoms: Itchy red blisters, fever, fatigue, loss of appetite.
diseases.treatment: Antiviral drugs in severe cases, supportive care.

diseases.name: Shingles (Herpes Zoster)
diseases.symptoms: Painful rash, blisters, burning sensation, fever.
diseases.treatment: Antiviral drugs, pain management.

diseases.name: Herpes (HSV-1 & HSV-2)
diseases.symptoms: Painful sores, blisters on lips (HSV-1) or genitals (HSV-2), flu-like symptoms.
diseases.treatment: Antiviral medications, supportive care.

diseases.name: Rabies
diseases.symptoms: Fever, hydrophobia, confusion, paralysis, death if untreated.
diseases.treatment: Post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP), rabies vaccine, immune globulin.

diseases.name: Polio (Poliomyelitis)
diseases.symptoms: Fever, headache, paralysis, muscle weakness.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, vaccination for prevention.

diseases.name: Ebola
diseases.symptoms: Severe fever, vomiting, diarrhea, bleeding, organ failure.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, fluid replacement, experimental antivirals.

diseases.name: Zika Virus
diseases.symptoms: Mild fever, rash, conjunctivitis, joint pain.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, rest, hydration.

diseases.name: Marburg Virus Disease
diseases.symptoms: High fever, severe headache, internal bleeding, organ failure.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, hydration, experimental treatments.

diseases.name: HIV/AIDS
diseases.symptoms: Weak immune system, recurrent infections, weight loss, night sweats.
diseases.treatment: Antiretroviral therapy (ART) to manage virus levels.

diseases.name: Candidiasis (Oral/Genital Thrush, Systemic Candidiasis)
diseases.symptoms: White patches in mouth, itching, redness, burning sensation, systemic infection in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Antifungal medications, maintaining proper hygiene.

diseases.name: Aspergillosis
diseases.symptoms: Cough, fever, chest pain, breathing difficulties, invasive infections in immunocompromised individuals.
diseases.treatment: Antifungal therapy, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Ringworm (Dermatophytosis)
diseases.symptoms: Red, circular, itchy rash on the skin, hair loss in affected areas.
diseases.treatment: Topical and oral antifungal medications.

diseases.name: Athlete’s Foot (Tinea Pedis)
diseases.symptoms: Itching, burning, cracked skin between toes, foul odor.
diseases.treatment: Topical antifungal creams, foot hygiene.

diseases.name: Histoplasmosis
diseases.symptoms: Fever, cough, chest pain, fatigue, severe lung infection in some cases.
diseases.treatment: Antifungal therapy for severe cases.

diseases.name: Cryptococcosis
diseases.symptoms: Fever, cough, shortness of breath, meningitis in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Antifungal therapy, supportive care.

diseases.name: Blastomycosis
diseases.symptoms: Fever, cough, skin lesions, lung infection.
diseases.treatment: Antifungal therapy for moderate to severe cases.

diseases.name: Malaria
diseases.causative_agent: Plasmodium falciparum, P. vivax, P. ovale, P. malariae
diseases.symptoms: Fever, chills, sweating, headache, muscle pain, anemia.
diseases.treatment: Antimalarial medications, supportive care.

diseases.name: Amoebiasis
diseases.symptoms: Diarrhea, abdominal cramps, blood in stool, liver abscess in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Antiprotozoal medications, hydration therapy.

diseases.name: Giardiasis
diseases.symptoms: Watery diarrhea, bloating, nausea, weight loss.
diseases.treatment: Antiprotozoal therapy, hydration.

diseases.name: Toxoplasmosis
diseases.symptoms: Flu-like symptoms, swollen lymph nodes, muscle aches, severe complications in immunocompromised individuals.
diseases.treatment: Antiparasitic medications for severe cases.

diseases.name: Leishmaniasis
diseases.symptoms: Skin sores, fever, weight loss, organ damage in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Antiprotozoal therapy, supportive care.

diseases.name: Trypanosomiasis (Sleeping Sickness, Chagas Disease)
diseases.symptoms: Fever, fatigue, swelling, neurological complications.
diseases.treatment: Antiprotozoal medications, vector control.

diseases.name: Ascariasis
diseases.symptoms: Abdominal pain, nausea, weight loss, intestinal blockage in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Anthelmintic medications.

diseases.name: Schistosomiasis (Bilharzia)
diseases.symptoms: Fever, abdominal pain, blood in urine or stool, liver damage.
diseases.treatment: Antiparasitic medications.

diseases.name: Hookworm Infection
diseases.symptoms: Abdominal pain, diarrhea, anemia.
diseases.treatment: Anthelmintic medications.

diseases.name: Tapeworm Infection
diseases.symptoms: Mild digestive issues, weight loss, neurocysticercosis in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Anthelmintic medications.

diseases.name: Filariasis (Elephantiasis)
diseases.symptoms: Swelling of limbs, fever, skin thickening.
diseases.treatment: Antiparasitic therapy, supportive care.

diseases.name: Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease (CJD)
diseases.symptoms: Rapid mental decline, memory loss, muscle stiffness, vision problems, difficulty speaking, coma.
diseases.treatment: No cure, supportive care for symptom management.

diseases.name: Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy (Mad Cow Disease)
diseases.symptoms: Difficulty walking, behavioral changes, weight loss, nervous system degeneration, eventual paralysis.
diseases.treatment: No cure, supportive care.

diseases.name: Fatal Familial Insomnia (FFI)
diseases.causative_agent: Genetic mutation causing abnormal prion proteins
diseases.symptoms: Progressive insomnia, hallucinations, rapid weight loss, dementia, autonomic nervous system failure.
diseases.treatment: No cure, palliative care for symptom relief.
diseases.medicine: No specific medicine, sedatives and supportive therapy.

diseases.name: Coronary Artery Disease (CAD)
diseases.symptoms: Chest pain (angina), shortness of breath, fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medications, angioplasty, or bypass surgery.

diseases.name: Heart Attack (Myocardial Infarction, MI)
diseases.symptoms: Severe chest pain, arm/jaw pain, shortness of breath, sweating.
diseases.treatment: Emergency medical care, clot-busting drugs, angioplasty, or bypass surgery.

diseases.name: Heart Failure (Congestive Heart Failure, CHF)
diseases.symptoms: Swelling in legs, fatigue, shortness of breath, rapid heartbeat.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medications, implanted devices, heart transplant in severe cases.

diseases.name: Arrhythmia (Irregular Heartbeat)
diseases.symptoms: Heart palpitations, dizziness, chest discomfort, fainting.
diseases.treatment: Medications, pacemaker, electrical cardioversion, catheter ablation.
diseases.medicine: Antiarrhythmic drugs, Beta-blockers, Calcium channel blockers.

diseases.name: Atrial Fibrillation (AFib)
diseases.symptoms: Irregular heartbeat, fatigue, dizziness, stroke risk.
diseases.treatment: Blood thinners, rate control medications, electrical cardioversion.

diseases.name: Ventricular Tachycardia (VT)
diseases.symptoms: Fast heart rate, dizziness, fainting, sudden cardiac arrest.
diseases.treatment: Antiarrhythmic medications, cardioversion, implantable defibrillator.

diseases.name: Bradycardia
diseases.symptoms: Slow heart rate, dizziness, fatigue, shortness of breath.
diseases.treatment: Pacemaker implantation if symptomatic.

diseases.name: Cardiomyopathy
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, swelling in legs, irregular heartbeat, shortness of breath.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle modifications, medications, heart transplant in severe cases.

diseases.name: Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy (HCM)
diseases.symptoms: Chest pain, dizziness, shortness of breath, fainting.
diseases.treatment: Medications, septal myectomy (surgery), implantable defibrillator.

diseases.name: Dilated Cardiomyopathy (DCM)
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, swelling, breathlessness, irregular heartbeat.
diseases.treatment: Medications, implanted devices, heart transplant in severe cases.

diseases.name: Restrictive Cardiomyopathy (RCM)
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, swelling, breathlessness, irregular heartbeat.
diseases.treatment: Medications to manage symptoms, heart transplant in severe cases.

diseases.name: Pericarditis
diseases.symptoms: Sharp chest pain, fever, weakness, heart palpitations.
diseases.treatment: Anti-inflammatory drugs, steroids, fluid drainage if severe.

diseases.name: Endocarditis
diseases.symptoms: Fever, chills, fatigue, weight loss, heart murmur.
diseases.treatment: Antibiotic therapy, surgery if necessary.

diseases.name: Hypertension (High Blood Pressure)
diseases.symptoms: Often asymptomatic; headaches, dizziness, nosebleeds in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medications, stress management.
diseases.medicine: ACE inhibitors, Beta-blockers, Diuretics, Calcium channel blockers.

diseases.name: Hypotension (Low Blood Pressure)
diseases.symptoms: Dizziness, fainting, blurred vision, shock in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Increased fluid intake, salt intake, medications if necessary.

diseases.name: Atherosclerosis
diseases.symptoms: Chest pain, numbness, weakness, stroke or heart attack risk.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle modifications, cholesterol-lowering drugs, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Arteriosclerosis
diseases.symptoms: High blood pressure, poor circulation, heart attack/stroke risk.
diseases.treatment: Healthy diet, exercise, cholesterol-lowering medications.

diseases.name: Aneurysm
diseases.symptoms: Usually asymptomatic until rupture; sudden severe pain, dizziness, fainting.
diseases.treatment: Monitoring for small aneurysms, surgery or stenting for large ones.

diseases.name: Aortic Aneurysm
diseases.symptoms: Pain in chest, back, or abdomen, pulsating feeling in the stomach.
diseases.treatment: Monitoring, surgical repair if at risk of rupture.

diseases.name: Brain Aneurysm
diseases.symptoms: Severe headache, nausea, vision problems, loss of consciousness.
diseases.treatment: Surgery (clipping or coiling), blood pressure management.

diseases.name: Peripheral Artery Disease (PAD)
diseases.symptoms: Leg pain when walking, numbness, slow-healing wounds.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medications, angioplasty, bypass surgery.

diseases.name: Carotid Artery Disease
diseases.symptoms: Stroke symptoms (weakness, speech issues, vision problems).
diseases.treatment: Medications, lifestyle changes, carotid endarterectomy (surgery).
diseases.medicine: Statins, Antiplatelet drugs (Aspirin, Clopidogrel), Blood pressure meds.

diseases.name: Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT)
diseases.symptoms: Swelling, pain, warmth in affected leg, redness.
diseases.treatment: Anticoagulant therapy, compression stockings, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Pulmonary Embolism (PE)
diseases.symptoms: Shortness of breath, chest pain, rapid heart rate, coughing up blood.
diseases.treatment: Anticoagulation therapy, clot-dissolving drugs, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Ischemic Stroke
diseases.symptoms: Sudden weakness/numbness (especially on one side), trouble speaking, vision problems, severe headache, loss of coordination.
diseases.treatment: Emergency clot-busting medications, mechanical thrombectomy, rehabilitation therapy.
diseases.medicine: Thrombolytics (tPA - tissue plasminogen activator), Antiplatelet drugs (Aspirin, Clopidogrel), Anticoagulants (Warfarin, Heparin).

diseases.name: Hemorrhagic Stroke
diseases.symptoms: Severe headache, nausea, vomiting, loss of consciousness, vision issues, sudden weakness.
diseases.treatment: Emergency blood pressure management, surgery to stop bleeding, aneurysm repair if needed.
diseases.medicine: Antihypertensive drugs (Labetalol, Nicardipine), Anti-seizure medications if required.

diseases.name: Transient Ischemic Attack (TIA, Mini-Stroke)
diseases.symptoms: Temporary weakness, speech issues, dizziness, blurred vision, symptoms resolve within 24 hours.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, blood-thinning medications, surgery in high-risk cases.

diseases.name: Congenital Heart Defects
diseases.symptoms: Bluish skin (cyanosis), rapid breathing, poor feeding, fatigue, swelling in the legs or abdomen.
diseases.treatment: Monitoring for mild cases, surgery or catheter-based procedures for severe cases.

diseases.name: Septal Defects (Atrial Septal Defect - ASD / Ventricular Septal Defect - VSD)
diseases.symptoms: Heart murmur, fatigue, shortness of breath, frequent respiratory infections, poor growth in infants.
diseases.treatment: Small defects may close on their own; larger ones require surgery or catheter-based repair.
diseases.medicine: Diuretics, Digoxin (to strengthen the heart), blood thinners if needed.

diseases.name: Tetralogy of Fallot
diseases.symptoms: Cyanosis (blue skin), difficulty breathing, fainting, clubbing of fingers and toes, heart murmur.
diseases.treatment: Surgical repair in infancy (intracardiac repair).
diseases.medicine: Prostaglandins (to keep blood vessels open in newborns before surgery), Beta-blockers (Propranolol) for symptom management.

diseases.name: Patent Ductus Arteriosus (PDA)
diseases.symptoms: Heart murmur, rapid breathing, poor weight gain, fatigue, frequent lung infections.
diseases.treatment: Medication to close PDA in premature babies, catheter-based closure, or surgery for larger PDAs.
diseases.medicine: Indomethacin, Ibuprofen (to help close the PDA in newborns).

diseases.name: Coarctation of the Aorta
diseases.symptoms: High blood pressure, weak or absent pulses in the legs, shortness of breath, headaches, chest pain.
diseases.treatment: Balloon angioplasty with stenting or surgical repair.

diseases.name: Aortic Stenosis
diseases.symptoms: Chest pain, shortness of breath, fatigue, fainting (syncope), palpitations.
diseases.treatment: Monitoring for mild cases, valve replacement (surgical or transcatheter).

diseases.name: Mitral Valve Prolapse (MVP)
diseases.symptoms: Heart palpitations, dizziness, chest pain, shortness of breath, fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Usually no treatment for mild cases; surgery for severe regurgitation.

diseases.name: Mitral Regurgitation
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, shortness of breath, swollen ankles, heart palpitations.
diseases.treatment: Valve repair or replacement in severe cases.

diseases.name: Tricuspid Regurgitation
diseases.symptoms: Swelling in the legs and abdomen, fatigue, irregular heartbeat, shortness of breath.
diseases.treatment: Medication to relieve symptoms, valve repair or replacement if severe.

diseases.name: Asthma
diseases.symptoms: Shortness of breath, wheezing, chest tightness, coughing.
diseases.treatment: Inhalers, bronchodilators, corticosteroids.

diseases.name: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
diseases.symptoms: Chronic cough, shortness of breath, wheezing, mucus production.
diseases.treatment: Bronchodilators, oxygen therapy, pulmonary rehabilitation.

diseases.name: Emphysema
diseases.symptoms: Shortness of breath, chronic cough, fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Oxygen therapy, pulmonary rehabilitation, smoking cessation.

diseases.name: Chronic Bronchitis
diseases.symptoms: Persistent cough with mucus, shortness of breath, wheezing.
diseases.treatment: Cough suppressants, bronchodilators, pulmonary therapy.

diseases.name: Pneumonia
diseases.symptoms: Fever, cough with phlegm, difficulty breathing, chest pain.
diseases.treatment: Antibiotics (if bacterial), oxygen therapy, rest.

diseases.name: Tuberculosis (TB)
diseases.symptoms: Chronic cough, weight loss, night sweats, fever.
diseases.treatment: Long-term antibiotic therapy (6+ months).

diseases.name: Bronchitis
diseases.symptoms: Cough with mucus, chest discomfort, mild fever.
diseases.treatment: Rest, fluids, cough suppressants, bronchodilators.

diseases.name: Pulmonary Abscess
diseases.symptoms: Fever, cough with foul-smelling sputum, chest pain, night sweats.
diseases.treatment: Antibiotics, drainage of abscess if needed.

diseases.name: Pulmonary Embolism (PE)
diseases.symptoms: Sudden shortness of breath, chest pain, rapid heart rate, coughing up blood.
diseases.treatment: Anticoagulants, thrombolytic therapy, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Pulmonary Hypertension
diseases.symptoms: Shortness of breath, fatigue, chest pain, dizziness, swelling in legs.
diseases.treatment: Vasodilators, oxygen therapy, lifestyle modifications.

diseases.name: Pulmonary Edema
diseases.symptoms: Severe shortness of breath, wheezing, coughing up pink frothy sputum, rapid breathing.
diseases.treatment: Diuretics, oxygen therapy, treatment of underlying heart or lung condition.

diseases.name: Pulmonary Fibrosis
diseases.symptoms: Shortness of breath, chronic dry cough, fatigue, chest discomfort.
diseases.treatment: Oxygen therapy, pulmonary rehabilitation, antifibrotic medications.

diseases.name: Sarcoidosis
diseases.symptoms: Persistent cough, shortness of breath, chest pain, fatigue, skin rashes.
diseases.treatment: Corticosteroids, immunosuppressive therapy.

diseases.name: Asbestosis
diseases.symptoms: Shortness of breath, persistent dry cough, chest tightness, clubbing of fingers.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, oxygen therapy, pulmonary rehabilitation.

diseases.name: Silicosis
diseases.symptoms: Chronic cough, shortness of breath, fatigue, chest tightness.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, bronchodilators, corticosteroids.

diseases.name: Coal Workers’ Pneumoconiosis (Black Lung Disease)
diseases.symptoms: Chronic cough, difficulty breathing, chest tightness, mucus production.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, pulmonary rehabilitation, oxygen therapy.

diseases.name: Pleurisy
diseases.symptoms: Sharp chest pain during breathing, shortness of breath, cough, fever.
diseases.treatment: Pain relievers, anti-inflammatory drugs, treatment of underlying cause.

diseases.name: Pneumothorax (Collapsed Lung)
diseases.symptoms: Sudden chest pain, difficulty breathing, rapid heart rate, cyanosis (bluish skin).
diseases.treatment: Oxygen therapy, needle aspiration, chest tube insertion.

diseases.name: Pleural Effusion
diseases.symptoms: Chest pain, difficulty breathing, cough, reduced breath sounds.
diseases.treatment: Drainage of fluid (thoracentesis), treating underlying condition.

diseases.name: Sleep Apnea
diseases.symptoms: Loud snoring, daytime sleepiness, gasping during sleep, headaches.
diseases.treatment: CPAP therapy, weight management, lifestyle changes.

diseases.name: Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA)
diseases.symptoms: Interrupted breathing during sleep, loud snoring, fatigue, difficulty concentrating.
diseases.treatment: CPAP therapy, oral appliances, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Lung Cancer
diseases.symptoms: Persistent cough, chest pain, coughing up blood, weight loss, shortness of breath.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, targeted therapy.

diseases.name: Mesothelioma
diseases.symptoms: Chest pain, shortness of breath, fluid buildup in the lungs, fatigue, weight loss.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, immunotherapy.

diseases.name: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
diseases.symptoms: Heartburn, regurgitation, chest pain, difficulty swallowing.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, acid-suppressing medications, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Esophagitis
diseases.symptoms: Painful swallowing, heartburn, chest pain, nausea.
diseases.treatment: Acid suppression, avoiding irritants, treating infections if present.
diseases.medicine: Proton pump inhibitors (PPIs), Corticosteroids, Antifungals (if fungal infection)

diseases.name: Barrett’s Esophagus
diseases.symptoms: Chronic heartburn, regurgitation, difficulty swallowing.
diseases.treatment: Acid suppression, lifestyle modifications, endoscopic therapy.

diseases.name: Achalasia
diseases.symptoms: Difficulty swallowing, chest pain, regurgitation, weight loss.
diseases.treatment: Balloon dilation, Botox injections, surgery (Heller myotomy).

diseases.name: Esophageal Stricture
diseases.symptoms: Difficulty swallowing, chest discomfort, regurgitation of food.
diseases.treatment: Esophageal dilation, acid suppression therapy.

diseases.name: Esophageal Cancer
diseases.symptoms: Difficulty swallowing, weight loss, chest pain, persistent cough.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, targeted therapy.

diseases.name: Gastritis
diseases.symptoms: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, bloating, indigestion.
diseases.treatment: Acid-suppressing medications, lifestyle changes, treating infections if present.

diseases.name: Peptic Ulcer Disease (PUD)
diseases.symptoms: Burning stomach pain, bloating, nausea, vomiting, black stools.
diseases.treatment: Acid suppression, antibiotics (if H. pylori infection), lifestyle changes.

diseases.name: Gastroenteritis (Stomach Flu)
diseases.symptoms: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, stomach cramps, fever.
diseases.treatment: Hydration, rest, symptomatic relief.

diseases.name: Stomach Cancer
diseases.symptoms: Unexplained weight loss, persistent stomach pain, nausea, vomiting, bloating.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, targeted therapy.

diseases.name: Hepatitis (A, B, C, D, E)
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, jaundice, nausea, abdominal pain, dark urine.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care for acute cases, antiviral medications for chronic cases.

diseases.name: Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD & AFLD)
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, abdominal discomfort, unexplained weight loss.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, weight management, alcohol cessation (for AFLD).

diseases.name: Cirrhosis
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, jaundice, swelling in legs, confusion, easy bruising.
diseases.treatment: Managing underlying cause, liver transplant in severe cases.

diseases.name: Liver Cancer (Hepatocellular Carcinoma)
diseases.symptoms: Unintentional weight loss, abdominal pain, jaundice, nausea.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, targeted therapy, liver transplant.

diseases.name: Jaundice
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing of the skin and eyes, dark urine, pale stools, fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Treating underlying cause, phototherapy (for newborns).
diseases.medicine: Ursodeoxycholic acid, Cholestyramine, Antiviral drugs (if caused by hepatitis)

diseases.name: Hemochromatosis
diseases.symptoms: Joint pain, fatigue, liver enlargement, skin darkening.
diseases.treatment: Regular blood removal (phlebotomy), iron chelation therapy.

diseases.name: Gallstones (Cholelithiasis)
diseases.symptoms: Severe abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, jaundice.
diseases.treatment: Observation, medications to dissolve stones, surgery (cholecystectomy).

diseases.name: Cholecystitis
diseases.symptoms: Sharp upper abdominal pain, fever, nausea, bloating.
diseases.treatment: Antibiotics, pain relievers, gallbladder removal if severe.

diseases.name: Biliary Obstruction
diseases.symptoms: Jaundice, dark urine, pale stools, abdominal pain.
diseases.treatment: Endoscopic removal of blockage, surgery, stent placement.

diseases.name: Gallbladder Cancer
diseases.symptoms: Abdominal pain, jaundice, nausea, weight loss, bloating.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy.

diseases.name: Pancreatitis (Acute & Chronic)
diseases.symptoms: Severe abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, fever, weight loss.
diseases.treatment: IV fluids, pain management, enzyme supplements for chronic cases.

diseases.name: Pancreatic Cancer
diseases.symptoms: Jaundice, unexplained weight loss, abdominal pain, loss of appetite.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, targeted therapy.

diseases.name: Diabetes Mellitus (Type 1 & Type 2)
diseases.symptoms: Frequent urination, excessive thirst, fatigue, blurred vision.
diseases.treatment: Insulin therapy (Type 1), oral medications and lifestyle changes (Type 2).

diseases.name: Crohn’s Disease
diseases.symptoms: Abdominal pain, diarrhea, weight loss, fatigue, mouth sores.
diseases.treatment: Anti-inflammatory drugs, immunosuppressants, surgery if necessary.

diseases.name: Ulcerative Colitis (UC)
diseases.symptoms: Bloody diarrhea, abdominal cramps, fatigue, weight loss.
diseases.treatment: Anti-inflammatory drugs, immunosuppressants, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
diseases.symptoms: Abdominal pain, bloating, gas, diarrhea or constipation.
diseases.treatment: Dietary modifications, stress management, symptom-based medications.

diseases.name: Celiac Disease
diseases.symptoms: Diarrhea, bloating, weight loss, fatigue, anemia.
diseases.treatment: Strict gluten-free diet, vitamin and mineral supplementation.
diseases.medicine: Gluten-free diet, Vitamin D, Iron supplements

diseases.name: Lactose Intolerance
diseases.symptoms: Bloating, diarrhea, gas, stomach cramps after dairy consumption.
diseases.treatment: Lactose-free diet, lactase enzyme supplements.

diseases.name: Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth (SIBO)
diseases.symptoms: Bloating, diarrhea, abdominal pain, malnutrition.
diseases.treatment: Antibiotics, dietary modifications, probiotics.

diseases.name: Diverticulosis & Diverticulitis
diseases.symptoms: Lower abdominal pain, bloating, fever (in diverticulitis).
diseases.treatment: High-fiber diet (for diverticulosis), antibiotics and rest (for diverticulitis).

diseases.name: Appendicitis
diseases.symptoms: Severe lower right abdominal pain, fever, nausea, vomiting.
diseases.treatment: Emergency surgical removal of the appendix (appendectomy).

diseases.name: Colorectal Cancer
diseases.symptoms: Rectal bleeding, weight loss, abdominal pain, changes in bowel habits.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, targeted therapy.

diseases.name: Hemorrhoids
diseases.symptoms: Rectal pain, itching, bleeding, swelling around the anus.
diseases.treatment: Dietary fiber increase, topical treatments, minimally invasive procedures.
diseases.medicine: Hydrocortisone cream, Witch hazel, Stool softeners

diseases.name: Anal Fissures
diseases.symptoms: Sharp pain during bowel movements, rectal bleeding, itching.
diseases.treatment: Topical anesthetics, stool softeners, warm baths, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Rectal Prolapse
diseases.symptoms: Rectal tissue protruding, discomfort, bowel leakage, bleeding.
diseases.treatment: Dietary changes, pelvic floor exercises, surgery if severe.
diseases.medicine: Stool softeners, Fiber supplements, Pain relievers

diseases.name: Fecal Incontinence
diseases.symptoms: Inability to control bowel movements, stool leakage, urgency.
diseases.treatment: Pelvic floor therapy, dietary changes, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Gastroparesis
diseases.symptoms: Nausea, vomiting, bloating, early fullness, abdominal pain.
diseases.treatment: Dietary changes, prokinetic medications, gastric electrical stimulation.

diseases.name: Hirschsprung’s Disease
diseases.symptoms: Severe constipation, swollen abdomen, failure to pass stool in newborns.
diseases.treatment: Surgical removal of affected colon segment.

diseases.name: Intestinal Obstruction
diseases.symptoms: Severe abdominal pain, bloating, constipation, vomiting.
diseases.treatment: IV fluids, bowel rest, surgery if severe.
diseases.medicine: Nasogastric decompression, Pain relievers, IV fluids

diseases.name: Alzheimer’s Disease
diseases.symptoms: Memory loss, confusion, difficulty thinking, personality changes.
diseases.treatment: Medications to slow progression, cognitive therapy, supportive care.

diseases.name: Parkinson’s Disease
diseases.symptoms: Tremors, muscle stiffness, slow movement, balance issues.
diseases.treatment: Dopamine replacement therapy, deep brain stimulation, physical therapy.

diseases.name: Huntington’s Disease
diseases.symptoms: Involuntary movements, cognitive decline, mood disturbances.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, symptom management, speech and physical therapy.

diseases.name: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS, Lou Gehrig’s Disease)
diseases.symptoms: Muscle weakness, difficulty speaking and swallowing, respiratory failure.
diseases.treatment: Medications to slow progression, physical therapy, respiratory support.

diseases.name: Multiple Sclerosis (MS)
diseases.symptoms: Numbness, weakness, vision problems, difficulty with coordination.
diseases.treatment: Immunomodulatory therapy, physical therapy, steroids for flare-ups.

diseases.name: Friedreich’s Ataxia
diseases.symptoms: Coordination loss, muscle weakness, heart problems, difficulty walking.
diseases.treatment: Physical therapy, assistive devices, symptom management.

diseases.name: Stroke (Cerebral Infarction)
diseases.symptoms: Sudden weakness, slurred speech, vision problems, facial drooping.
diseases.treatment: Emergency clot-busting medication, surgery, rehabilitation therapy.

diseases.name: Transient Ischemic Attack (TIA, Mini-Stroke)
diseases.symptoms: Temporary weakness, confusion, dizziness, speech difficulties.
diseases.treatment: Blood thinners, lifestyle changes, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Aneurysm
diseases.symptoms: Often asymptomatic until rupture, severe headache, vision problems, nausea.
diseases.treatment: Surgical clipping, endovascular coiling, blood pressure management.
diseases.medicine: Antihypertensives, Pain relievers, Calcium channel blockers

diseases.name: Brain Hemorrhage (Intracerebral Hemorrhage)
diseases.symptoms: Severe headache, weakness, loss of consciousness, nausea, vision issues.
diseases.treatment: Blood pressure control, surgery to stop bleeding, supportive care.

diseases.name: Vascular Dementia
diseases.symptoms: Memory loss, difficulty concentrating, confusion, mood changes.
diseases.treatment: Managing underlying conditions, cognitive therapy, lifestyle changes.

diseases.name: Essential Tremor
diseases.symptoms: Uncontrollable shaking, usually in the hands, worsening with movement.
diseases.treatment: Medications, physical therapy, deep brain stimulation in severe cases.

diseases.name: Dystonia
diseases.symptoms: Involuntary muscle contractions, twisting movements, abnormal postures.
diseases.treatment: Muscle relaxants, botulinum toxin injections, deep brain stimulation.

diseases.name: Tourette Syndrome
diseases.symptoms: Involuntary tics, sudden movements or vocalizations, worsens with stress.
diseases.treatment: Behavioral therapy, medications to reduce tics.

diseases.name: Restless Legs Syndrome (RLS)
diseases.symptoms: Uncontrollable urge to move the legs, especially at night, discomfort.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medications, iron supplements if deficient.

diseases.name: Cerebral Palsy (CP)
diseases.symptoms: Muscle stiffness, difficulty with movement, poor coordination, speech problems.
diseases.treatment: Physical therapy, speech therapy, medications, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Epilepsy
diseases.symptoms: Recurrent seizures, loss of consciousness, abnormal movements, confusion.
diseases.treatment: Antiepileptic medications, lifestyle modifications, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Absence Seizures (Petit Mal)
diseases.symptoms: Brief lapses in awareness, staring spells, sudden stopping of activity.
diseases.treatment: Antiepileptic medications, lifestyle adjustments.

diseases.name: Tonic-Clonic Seizures (Grand Mal)
diseases.symptoms: Severe convulsions, loss of consciousness, muscle rigidity, jerking movements.
diseases.treatment: Antiseizure medications, emergency care for prolonged seizures.

diseases.name: Focal Seizures
diseases.symptoms: Seizures affecting one part of the brain, twitching, altered senses, confusion.
diseases.treatment: Medications, surgery in severe cases, dietary therapy.

diseases.name: Guillain-Barré Syndrome (GBS)
diseases.symptoms: Muscle weakness, tingling, paralysis, difficulty breathing in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Plasmapheresis, intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIG), supportive care.

diseases.name: Peripheral Neuropathy
diseases.symptoms: Numbness, tingling, burning pain, muscle weakness, loss of coordination.
diseases.treatment: Treating underlying condition, pain management, physical therapy.

diseases.name: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
diseases.symptoms: Numbness, tingling, and weakness in the hand and fingers, wrist pain.
diseases.treatment: Wrist splints, physical therapy, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Bell’s Palsy
diseases.symptoms: Sudden facial paralysis or weakness, drooping of one side of the face.
diseases.treatment: Corticosteroids, antiviral therapy if viral infection is suspected.

diseases.name: Sciatica
diseases.symptoms: Sharp pain radiating from the lower back down the leg, numbness, tingling.
diseases.treatment: Physical therapy, pain management, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Multiple Sclerosis (MS)
diseases.symptoms: Muscle weakness, vision problems, fatigue, difficulty with coordination and balance.
diseases.treatment: Immunomodulatory drugs, physical therapy, symptom management.

diseases.name: Myasthenia Gravis
diseases.symptoms: Muscle weakness, difficulty swallowing, drooping eyelids, fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Immunosuppressants, acetylcholinesterase inhibitors, plasma exchange in severe cases.

diseases.name: Lupus-Related Neuropathy
diseases.symptoms: Nerve pain, muscle weakness, numbness, cognitive issues, seizures.
diseases.treatment: Immunosuppressive therapy, corticosteroids, pain management.

diseases.name: Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI)
diseases.symptoms: Headache, confusion, dizziness, memory loss, mood changes, loss of consciousness.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, physical therapy, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Spinal Cord Injury (SCI)
diseases.symptoms: Loss of movement, numbness, paralysis, difficulty breathing in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Immobilization, physical therapy, surgery, rehabilitation.

diseases.name: Concussion
diseases.symptoms: Headache, confusion, dizziness, nausea, memory problems, temporary loss of consciousness.
diseases.treatment: Rest, symptom management, gradual return to activities.

diseases.name: Migraine
diseases.symptoms: Severe throbbing headache, nausea, vomiting, sensitivity to light and sound, visual disturbances.
diseases.treatment: Pain management, lifestyle changes, preventive medications.

diseases.name: Cluster Headaches
diseases.symptoms: Intense burning or piercing headache, usually around one eye, nasal congestion, watery eyes.
diseases.treatment: Oxygen therapy, pain relievers, preventive medications.

diseases.name: Tension Headaches
diseases.symptoms: Dull, aching head pain, tightness or pressure across forehead or back of the head.
diseases.treatment: Stress management, physical therapy, pain relief medications.

diseases.name: Trigeminal Neuralgia
diseases.symptoms: Severe, stabbing facial pain triggered by mild stimulation like touch or chewing.
diseases.treatment: Medication, nerve blocks, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Narcolepsy
diseases.symptoms: Excessive daytime sleepiness, sudden sleep attacks, cataplexy (sudden muscle weakness), hallucinations, sleep paralysis.
diseases.treatment: Stimulant medications, lifestyle adjustments, scheduled naps.

diseases.name: Sleep Apnea
diseases.symptoms: Loud snoring, choking or gasping during sleep, excessive daytime fatigue, morning headaches.
diseases.treatment: CPAP therapy, weight management, surgery in severe cases.
diseases.medicine: Nasal decongestants, Positive airway pressure therapy

diseases.name: REM Sleep Behavior Disorder
diseases.symptoms: Acting out dreams, talking, shouting, kicking, or punching during sleep.
diseases.treatment: Sleep safety precautions, medication to suppress abnormal movements.

diseases.name: Glioblastoma
diseases.symptoms: Severe headaches, nausea, vomiting, seizures, personality changes, memory loss.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, radiation therapy, chemotherapy, targeted therapy.

diseases.name: Meningioma
diseases.symptoms: Headaches, vision problems, seizures, weakness in limbs, cognitive difficulties.
diseases.treatment: Observation, surgery, radiation therapy.

diseases.name: Acoustic Neuroma
diseases.symptoms: Hearing loss, ringing in the ears (tinnitus), balance issues, dizziness.
diseases.treatment: Observation, radiation therapy, surgery.

diseases.name: Pituitary Tumors
diseases.symptoms: Hormonal imbalances, vision problems, unexplained weight changes, fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Medication, surgery, radiation therapy.
diseases.medicine: Dopamine agonists (Cabergoline, Bromocriptine), Hormone replacement therapy

diseases.name: Hypothyroidism
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, weight gain, cold intolerance, dry skin, slow heart rate.
diseases.treatment: Thyroid hormone replacement therapy.

diseases.name: Hyperthyroidism
diseases.symptoms: Weight loss, rapid heartbeat, excessive sweating, nervousness, heat intolerance.
diseases.treatment: Antithyroid medications, radioactive iodine therapy, surgery.

diseases.name: Goiter
diseases.symptoms: Swelling in the neck, difficulty swallowing, hoarseness.
diseases.treatment: Iodine supplementation, thyroid hormone therapy, surgery if severe.

diseases.name: Hashimoto’s Thyroiditis
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, weight gain, joint pain, depression, hair thinning.
diseases.treatment: Thyroid hormone replacement therapy.

diseases.name: Graves’ Disease
diseases.symptoms: Bulging eyes, weight loss, rapid heartbeat, tremors, heat intolerance.
diseases.treatment: Antithyroid medications, radioactive iodine therapy, surgery.

diseases.name: Thyroid Nodules
diseases.symptoms: Lump in the neck, difficulty swallowing, voice changes (if large).
diseases.treatment: Monitoring, biopsy, surgery if cancerous.

diseases.name: Thyroid Cancer
diseases.symptoms: Neck lump, voice changes, difficulty swallowing, swollen lymph nodes.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, radioactive iodine therapy, chemotherapy, targeted therapy.

diseases.name: Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
diseases.symptoms: Frequent urination, excessive thirst, weight loss, fatigue, blurred vision.
diseases.treatment: Insulin therapy, blood sugar monitoring, dietary management.

diseases.name: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
diseases.symptoms: Increased thirst, frequent urination, fatigue, slow wound healing, blurred vision.
diseases.treatment: Dietary changes, exercise, oral medications, insulin if needed.
diseases.medicine: Metformin, Sulfonylureas, DPP-4 inhibitors, Insulin (if needed)

diseases.name: Gestational Diabetes
diseases.symptoms: Usually asymptomatic, sometimes excessive thirst, frequent urination.
diseases.treatment: Diet control, exercise, insulin therapy if necessary.

diseases.name: Prediabetes
diseases.symptoms: Often no symptoms, but may include increased thirst and fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle modifications (diet, exercise), weight management.

diseases.name: Diabetic Ketoacidosis (DKA)
diseases.symptoms: Nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, rapid breathing, fruity-smelling breath, confusion.
diseases.treatment: Intravenous fluids, insulin therapy, electrolyte replacement.

diseases.name: Cushing’s Syndrome
diseases.symptoms: Weight gain, high blood pressure, muscle weakness, thinning skin, round face.
diseases.treatment: Reducing corticosteroid use, surgery for tumors, radiation therapy.

diseases.name: Addison’s Disease
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, low blood pressure, weight loss, darkening of the skin, nausea.
diseases.treatment: Hormone replacement therapy, increased salt intake.

diseases.name: Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia (CAH)
diseases.symptoms: Irregular growth, early puberty, ambiguous genitalia in severe cases.
diseases.treatment: Hormone replacement therapy, surgery in severe cases.

diseases.name: Adrenal Insufficiency
diseases.symptoms: Weakness, fatigue, weight loss, nausea, low blood pressure.
diseases.treatment: Lifelong hormone replacement therapy.

diseases.name: Adrenal Tumors
diseases.symptoms: High blood pressure, weight gain, hormonal imbalances, excessive sweating.
diseases.treatment: Surgical removal, chemotherapy, radiation therapy.
diseases.medicine: Mitotane (for adrenal cancer), Spironolactone (for hormone control)

diseases.name: Acromegaly
diseases.symptoms: Enlarged hands and feet, facial changes, joint pain, thickened skin, fatigue.
diseases.treatment: Surgery to remove tumor, medications to reduce growth hormone, radiation therapy.

diseases.name: Pituitary Tumors
diseases.symptoms: Headaches, vision problems, hormone imbalances, unexplained weight changes.
diseases.treatment: Surgery, radiation therapy, medication for hormone regulation.

diseases.name: Hypopituitarism
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, low blood pressure, infertility, slow growth, reduced metabolism.
diseases.treatment: Hormone replacement therapy, treating underlying cause.

diseases.name: Prolactinoma
diseases.symptoms: Irregular menstrual cycles, infertility, milk production (galactorrhea), low libido.
diseases.treatment: Medications to shrink the tumor, surgery if necessary.

diseases.name: Hyperparathyroidism
diseases.symptoms: Weak bones, kidney stones, excessive urination, fatigue, depression.
diseases.treatment: Surgery to remove overactive gland, medications to manage calcium levels.

diseases.name: Hypoparathyroidism
diseases.symptoms: Muscle cramps, tingling in fingers, fatigue, brittle nails, seizures.
diseases.treatment: Calcium and vitamin D supplements, synthetic parathyroid hormone.

diseases.name: Osteoporosis
diseases.symptoms: Bone fractures, back pain, loss of height, fragile bones.
diseases.treatment: Calcium and vitamin D supplements, weight-bearing exercises, medications.

diseases.name: Rickets & Osteomalacia
diseases.symptoms: Soft bones, bone pain, muscle weakness, skeletal deformities.
diseases.treatment: Vitamin D and calcium supplementation, exposure to sunlight.

diseases.name: Paget’s Disease of Bone
diseases.symptoms: Bone pain, deformities, fractures, hearing loss.
diseases.treatment: Medications to regulate bone remodeling, surgery if severe.

diseases.name: Hypercalcemia
diseases.symptoms: Nausea, vomiting, confusion, muscle weakness, frequent urination.
diseases.treatment: Hydration, medications to lower calcium levels.

diseases.name: Hypocalcemia
diseases.symptoms: Muscle cramps, tingling in fingers, fatigue, seizures.
diseases.treatment: Calcium and vitamin D supplementation.

diseases.name: Vitamin D Deficiency
diseases.symptoms: Fatigue, bone pain, muscle weakness, increased risk of fractures.
diseases.treatment: Vitamin D supplementation, dietary changes.

diseases.name: Insulinoma
diseases.symptoms: Low blood sugar (hypoglycemia), dizziness, confusion, sweating, weakness.
diseases.treatment: Surgical removal of tumor, medications to manage blood sugar.

diseases.name: Glucagonoma
diseases.symptoms: High blood sugar (hyperglycemia), weight loss, skin rash (necrolytic migratory erythema), diarrhea.
diseases.treatment: Surgical removal of tumor, medications to control symptoms.
diseases.medicine: Somatostatin analogs (Octreotide, Lanreotide), Chemotherapy if malignant

diseases.name: Pancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumors (PNETs)
diseases.symptoms: Varies by hormone affected (e.g., excess insulin, glucagon, gastrin, or somatostatin production).
diseases.treatment: Surgery, targeted therapy, chemotherapy, hormone therapy.

diseases.name: Congenital Hyperinsulinism
diseases.symptoms: Severe hypoglycemia, irritability, seizures, poor feeding in infants.
diseases.treatment: Dietary management, medications, surgery in severe cases.
